homeHeader.title: From Advisory to Compliance, Get Seamless End-to-End Offshore Company Formation Solutions in Ajman With One Nexuz
homeHeader.description: Tap into the UAE’s fastest-growing economy by expanding to Ajman Offshore. With 100% foreign ownership, 0% corporate tax, and seamless operations, the region is ideal for holding assets and discovering profitable investments. Our expert business consultants streamline all the paperwork so you don’t get lost in compliance.

leftSection_1.title: What Makes Ajman Offshore a Global Business Magnet
leftSection_1.description: Take advantage of Ajman Offshore’s low overhead costs and tax-friendly environment to operate assets globally and diversify your real estate portfolio.

items.title: Expand Internationally Without Leasing Offices or Managing Visas

Cut down operational costs with Ajman Offshore’s no office or UAE residence visa requirements, you save on unnecessary expenses while keeping full flexibility. Start growing from day one and reinvest your capital where it matters most—into scaling your business.

items.title: Keep More Profits and Scale Faster with 100% Tax-Free Advantage
items.subTitle: Keep More Profits and Scale Faster with 100% Tax-Free Advantage
items.description: High taxes can significantly reduce your hard-earned profits. Elevate your bottom line with the region’s full repatriation and zero corporate and personal income tax requirements. Enjoy greater financial flexibility and use your profits to expand your business faster.

items.title: Seamless Multi-Currency Banking to Simplify and Scale Your Business Finances
items.subTitle: Seamless Multi-Currency Banking to Simplify and Scale Your Business Finances
items.description: Tired of banking limitations that slow down your business operations? Operate bank accounts within and beyond the UAE to streamline finances and exchange currencies without any restrictions. Enjoy full control over your funds and manage your business globally with ease.

items.title: Accelerate Your Business Setup and Start Operating in Days
items.subTitle: Accelerate Your Business Setup and Start Operating in Days
items.description: Slow registration can keep you from starting your business. Get registered in as little as 48-72 hours with Ajman Offshore’s seamless and 100% remote setup process. Start operating immediately and focus on building your business from day one.

leftSection_2.title: Choose the Right Offshore Company Formation in Ajman
leftSection_2.description: Ensure a successful Ajman offshore company setup journey by identifying the ideal legal structure. The region offers the following primary options:

items.title: Limited Liability Company
items.description: Ideal for international trade or asset holding with liability limited to shares.

items.title: Company Limited by Guarantee
items.description: Best suited for non-profit organisations, allowing them to limit liability to a certain amount.

items.title: Intellectual Property Holding
items.description: Perfect for global brands seeking to own and manage multiple IP assets.

items.title: Company Limited by Shares
items.description: Well-suited for international trade or asset holding with liability limited to their shares.

leftSection_3.title: Everything You Get With Your Offshore Company in Ajman

items.title: Memorandum & Articles of Association (MOA & AOA)
items.description: Define your Ajman Offshore company’s objectives and framework with officially approved MOA & AOA, ensuring 100% compliance with UAE offshore regulations.

items.title: Share Certificates
items.description: Maintain a clear record of corporate decisions through officially documented board resolutions, streamlining governance and supporting smooth operations.

items.title: Board Resolutions
items.description: Perfect for startups, partnerships, and group companies, an FZC offers businesses a multi-shareholder setup.

sec1.title: Drive 45% Faster Growth with Your Ajman Offshore Setup via One Nexuz
sec1.description: Launch in the UAE’s fastest-growing offshore hubs to hold assets, discover investment opportunities, and diversify your real estate portfolio. Partner with our experts to get growing today!

sec2.title: Compare Ajman Offshore Company Setup Costs
sec2.description: Get your company up and running without breaking the bank. Pay for exactly what you need—licenses, approvals, and services tailored to your company’s growth.

leftSection_5.title: Streamline Ajman Offshore Setup in 6 Steps

items.title: Get A Free Consultation
items.description: Book a complimentary, no-obligation session. We’ll review your goals (holding, asset protection, investment, etc.), confirm whether Ajman offshore is the right fit, and recommend the ideal business activities and ownership structure.

items.title: Connect With A Registered Agent
items.description: We assign a trusted UAE-registered agent to act as your local representative — providing a registered office address, managing all government paperwork, and ensuring smooth compliance. Alongside, we help you choose the best-fit legal structure that matches your goals while meeting Ajman offshore regulations.

items.title: Prepare & Submit Documents
items.description: Next, you provide KYC and company documents, passport copies, proof of address, and a business plan. We draft and notarize the MOA/AOA, prepare the incorporation file, and submit everything to the authority on your behalf.

items.title: Receive License & Incorporation Certificate
items.description: After approval and fee payment, you’ll receive the Certificate of Incorporation, Share Certificate, Board Resolution, trade license, and statutory documents — delivered to you along with a company kit and official records.

items.title: Open A Corporate Bank Account
items.description: We prepare a bank-ready package (business plan, beneficial-owner details, proof of funds), introduce you to suitable banks, and support the account-opening process and due diligence.

items.title: Ongoing Compliance & Dedicated Support
items.description: We handle annual renewals, corporate secretarial tasks,  and advise on accounting and record keeping where relevant. Plus, we provide ongoing PRO support for share transfers, director changes, and bank queries.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to set up an Ajman Offshore company?
items.answer: It typically takes 1-14 days, depending on your unique location, business activity, and document readiness.

items.question: Why should businesses set up in Ajman Offshore?
items.answer: Launching in Ajman Offshore provides you with 100% foreign ownership, 0% corporate and personal income taxes, no physical office requirements, and a paperless setup process.

items.question: Is Ajman Offshore subject to UAE corporate tax?
items.answer: No, you pay 0% corporate and personal income taxes within the UAE. However, you’ll have to pay a 5% tax to export goods.

items.question: What documents do I need to set up my Ajman Offshore company?
items.answer: You’ll need passport copies, proof of address, and the preferred company name. You might need to provide additional documents based on your business activity.

items.question: Can I use my Ajman Offshore company to hold property in the UAE?
items.answer: Yes, you can invest in and hold properties within Ajman Offshore, provided you have the necessary approvals and licenses. Our expert consultants can help you streamline the process based on your unique asset type and jurisdiction.
